data.text: Hi @jdrouven seems like it's not an app store issue but a device issue. Google addvised to do this and email nokairlinesinter@gmail.com
Hi @mysweetmouth seems like it's not an app store issue but a device issue. Google addvised to do this and email nokairlinesinter@gmail.com
This area in Chiang Rai known as The Golden Triangle links the three neighboring countries:Thailand,Laos,and Myanmar. http://t.co/Xh2muESeFN
Hi @jdrouven thanks for letting us know, and sorry about that! We're working to get that fixed.
It's time for Happy Hour! Book this offer from June 4 - 6 2014, between 3:00 am - 10:00 am at http://t.co/MbVu7TojH0 http://t.co/RTfQ2dY7h1
@aircrafts2lease Hi Peter, please contact Ms. Tip at Tip.Kos@nokair.com regarding charter inquiries, thanks!
Hi @mysweetmouth could you please let us know what country you're trying to download the mobile app from?
RT @Patee122: Within next two months we will start having wifi connectivity on board our aircrafts oh yeah! Get ready !
It's time for Happy Hour! Special fares starting at 888 THB. Read more information at http://t.co/MbVu7TojH0 http://t.co/3jhVV3oC1r
Good news! Nok Air has won approval for in-flight WiFi. http://t.co/Z4E2888eGj
A big Happy Birthday to Piya Yodmani, Nok Air's Deputy CEO. http://t.co/eY5vhyae5n
Nestled in the intimacy of nature, take a deep breath at the beautiful Doi Mae Salong mountain top in Chiang Rai. http://t.co/7bPYJulqMI
Hi @mysweetmouth we are currently working with Google on this issue, we will update once the problem is fixed. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Great shot @MattProsser2 :)
RT @MattProsser2: Nok Air Boeing 737-83N(WL) taking off from Phuket International Airport, Thailand @Aircraft_Photos @AirlinePicss http://t…
Hi @mysweetmouth we will check with our IT department and let you know, sorry for the inconvenience.
RT @jdrouven: @NokAirlines_ENG just had a great trip with this nice plane and a friendly crew. Thanks http://t.co/F9RJ6AtOhL
@jdrouven Great shot! Thank you so  much for sharing. Happy to hear that you enjoyed your flight with us.
Hi @ericksonLD please kindly contact our call center at 1318 for flight confirmation.
Nakhon Phanom's walking street is recommended for a weekend stroll and enjoy the surrounding of the Mekhong River. http://t.co/mTydibbnlD
@VDutchy Great to hear that, excited to have you on board for the first time :) Have a great flight!
@VDutchy Hi Victoria, just wanted to let you know that we've completed the change and you're now a "Ms." :)
@VDutchy With pleasure. You can select your seat by logging in with your booking number and last name. for more info: http://t.co/jp4yiE91xn
Hi @florathetty yes, passengers traveling to/from YGN can still enjoy 30kg of checked baggage for free :)
@VDutchy Thanks, we will have that fixed for you soon.
@VDutchy Hi Victoria, could you give us your booking number? We need that to make the change.
Hi @wukai110 Unfortunately the fee waiver is only available between May 22 - 26 as we announced. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@VDutchy Hi Victoria, we'll get that cleared up with our customer service for your sir... err m'am :) You'll get an email confirmation.
@sc0rpi0nce Wow great shot!
@wukai110 Also please notethat the curfew times have been relaxed with the new curfew from 24:00 - 4:00
@wukai110 The fee waiver for passengesr is only for travel dates from May 22-26, and we have checked your travel date which is May 31.
Nok Air is celebrating 300,000 Likes in Facebook with a giveaway of Nok Air gifts. Join us at http://t.co/ZVrnY1JAxh http://t.co/zw25oTJHOz
Fly with Nok Air's "Sabai promotion" with special fares starting at 980 THB. Find out more at http://t.co/PhzfSBNLoW http://t.co/Cvgz3egD4x
Hi @wukai110 please kindly call 1318 if you're in Thailand or +662-900-9955 from out of Thailand.
@BekahSheppard Great to hear that, hope you have a great trip :)
Hi @__Mugzy07 Yes we do have a  ticket counter at all airports, where you can pay by cash or credit card.
We would like to inform that Nok Air's "Check and Shop" service at Central Airport, Chiang Mai is currently available between 11:30 - 19:00.
@danwaites Sorry about that Dan, the weather isn't ideal today. Hope you dry off soon!
We regret to inform that the Nok Air 10th Anniversary Concert at the Khanom Festival 2014 will be postponed due to the current situation.

For the most up-to-date information on the situation in Thailand for tourists, please visit http://t.co/O8hTcyPDvB
#ThaiCoup
More routes! More fun! With Nok Air's special "Midnight Sale" fares. Read more information at http://t.co/hELIPoNZl9 http://t.co/t2jv8iQtXy
@RichardBarrow_ Hi Richard, unfortunately the midnight sale for Chiang Mai was only on May 23, don't worry, we'll have more promos soon :)
Book now! A paradise is waiting for you, special fare to Krabi starting at 899 THB. http://t.co/Jbh6TVYSNJ http://t.co/QnrMymPkh1
Do you miss the fresh ocean breeze? book the special fares to Krabi starting at 899THB at http://t.co/Jbh6TVYSNJ http://t.co/gmLgP9f7Q4
It's time to book something special! Nok Air special fare to Hat Yai. Book now at http://t.co/7slaUsDa5z http://t.co/oI7kc2Dr2G
If you are looking to have a trip in Hat Yai, don't miss our special fares. Read more http://t.co/7slaUsDa5z http://t.co/aluHcF4Z0C
Passengers can call taxi at 1661, 028789000 or AOT 021329199 for support 24 hours a day #thaicoup
@Pogopatmore @RichardBarrow Hi Martyn, sorry to hear you had a bad experience. We hope you'll fly with us again and have a better experience
600 designated taxis have signs from airport officials to pass military checkpoints during curfew hours. #ThaiCoup #Thailand (2/2)
Taxi service is available for passengers leaving Don Mueang Airport during the curfew hours between 22.00-05.00. #ThaiCoup #Thailand (1/2)
Start your booking now for Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai, book between 20:00 - 05:00 at http://t.co/7slaUsDa5z http://t.co/a7m16LZfME
Nok Air Midnight Sale special fares starting at 899 THB, 3 days 4 routes. Booking tonight at http://t.co/Jbh6TVYSNJ http://t.co/BaxNjIuXe3
@SakinahHassan_ you too, have a good flight and safe travels :)
@SakinahHassan_ We would advise to leave by 4pm if your flight is at 7:30 pm, just to avoid the rush hour crowd. Better safe than sorry :)
@SakinahHassan_ all passengers flying out of DMK are advised to leave extra early for their flight, as traffic will be congested.
@ANNEFLEURV we've just announced a waiver for flight changes due to the curfew. Please call 1318 for assistance.
Passengers affected by the curfew can change their flight with no change fee by calling 1318 then press 9 for English #Thailand #Thaicoup
BTS Skytrain services operate from until 21.00 tonight @BTS_SkyTrain #ThaiCoup #Thailand
The MRT services are operating from 6.00 - 21.00 with the last train leaving from Hua Lamphong and Bang Sue at 20.13 #ThaiCoup #Thailand
@ANNEFLEURV try using @GrabTaxiTH to get a cab. Please also have your travel documents ready for inspection as you go to the airport.
All Nok Air flights are operating as normal today. Please call 1318 and press 9 for English assistance. #thailand #ThaiCoup
Hi @ANNEFLEURV please contact our call center at 1318 and press 9 for English for assistance with changing the dates.

RT @RichardBarrow: Useful numbers for tourists:
TAT 1672 
Tourist Police 1155 
Airport 1722
Train 1690
Inter-Provincial Bus 1490
#Thailand …
@travlbum You should try using GrabTaxi or Uber at this point.
@travlbum please contact the airport for more info 02-132-1888
@travlbum if you can get a taxi, you are able to go as long as you have your travel documents ready for inspection points.
All flights operating as normal. Please have your travel documents ready for inspection points. #Thailand #Thaicoup
Taxis are standing up on the 1st floor of Terminal 1 ready to pick up passengers at Don Mueang Airport #Thailand #Thaicoup
Thanks @9VSKA our team is working around the clock to keep passengers informed so not to disrupt travel plans.
Additional shuttle van services are provided by the airport. For more information call 02-535-3861. #Thailand  #Thaicoup
Passengers traveling out of Don Mueang Airport can take the A1 shuttle bus to Mo Chit, which runs until 23.00
All Nok Air flights will operate as normal. We advise passengers to have all documents ready and spare extra time to avoid any inconvenience
passengers with late and early flights are required to have I.D. and travelling documents ready for inspection. 2/3
Nok Air would like to advise passengers that due to the curfew in effect between 22.00 - 05.00 1/3
Nok Air would like to inform passengers that all flights will be operating as normal, but please spare extra time in case of traffic.
@FHavg This is a straight edge winglet that is new, not the ones currently used http://t.co/0BozzjKW8n
Well, we must say it's a lot cooler than that :)@iamKohChang
How can you tell the difference between the 737-800 Next-Generation and MAX? MAX features the MAX AT winglet http://t.co/56JvWd8zB5
@ches these new planes will be used to increase our route network domestically  and they offer lower operating costs with high comfort :)
@thethaireport this is both for replacing planes in our fleet as well as for expanding to additional routes.
Our cabin crew with the @BoeingAirplanes 737 MAX special livery. http://t.co/jbG7m3jVm9
Chris Flint from Boeing being interviewed by the media after the Nok Air order announcement http://t.co/2zefnekctE
@bart3467 we have the widest seat pitch compared to all LCC in Thailand, and for you every inch matters!
@BoeingAirplanes presents a model of Nok Air’s 737 Max to celebrate the special occasion http://t.co/WUeEFAIzfC
Nok is proud to have started with leasing @BoeingAirplanes when we started, and now made our first order http://t.co/SEBAy2SuLy
Nok Air becomes the 40th operator of the @BoeingAirplanes 737 MAX and first operator in Thailand #avgeek http://t.co/tPstKeNEm1
@Patee122 and @BoeingAirplanes officially signed the order for the order in Bangkok. http://t.co/WQnIouvsn8
Nok Air is proud to announce confirmed orders for 15 @BoeingAirplanes 737-800 Next-Generation and Boeing 737 Max http://t.co/s0QX97zmKz
We have a BIG announcement for Nok Air, stay tuned and we will make an announcement in half an hour!
@Kanok_nk Great to hear that you love to fly with us. Hope everyone is having a good time at #psusocial
Hi @johantrip thanks for your inquiry. Any route announcements will be made here as soon as it happens, so please stay tuned :)
@ChidchiewKanok You can find special fare from Phuket-Don Mueang starting at 1090 THB here http://t.co/D9d6ODsFSf
Hi @Thavisin we are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your flight with Nok Air. We hope to see you again onboard soon :)
RT @Thavisin: Happy flying with Nok Air! Young, pretty, polite, attentive and knowledgeable hostesses . Efficient, no-fuss and on time serv…
Passengers are advised to check in 1 hour before their flight at the new airport start 19th of May, 2014. 2/2
Nok Air is pleased to announce that starting from 19th of May, Nok Air will operate from Nan's new airport. 1/2
If you have a chance to visit Nakhon Phanom, we suggest you to try Thai rice vermicelli at "Khanom Cheen Pissamai" http://t.co/dqTHsABBLL
If you have a chance to visit Nakhon Phanom, we suggest you to try Thai rice vermicelli at "Khanom Cheen Pissamai" http://t.co/PF25dB7uIJ
RT @rachelkoay: Gonna fly on bird air for the very first time, to Chiang Rai to help the earthquake victims #nokair @… http://t.co/n3OC4c4e…
@rachelkoay Thank you for flying with us, and for such a great cause!
